english.segment1: What can we say to describe just a glimpse of Your Glory. How can our words portray but a thread of Your Majesty. But still we praise our Savior in Spirit and in Truth. For we cannot say enough about You
english.segment2: What can we say to describe just a glimpse of Your Glory. How can our words portray but a thread of Your Majesty. But still we praise our Savior in Spirit and in Truth. For we cannot say enough about You
english.segment3: Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah. Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah
english.segment4: But still we praise our Savior in Spirit and in Truth. For we cannot say enough about You
english.segment5: Oh we cannot say.. enough about you. Ohhh we cannot say..
